conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Arre welcome back folks! [laughs] Toh Ananya, kya scene hai with our Mumbai Indians, yaar?

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Kabir, sahi mein, woh log toh record tod team hai! 5 IPL titles, seriously? Pagalpan!

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Bilkul, Rohit Sharma and team ka asli dhamaka! But yeh bata, kya Jayawardene aur Pandya ki combo kaisi lagi?

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: [sighs] Bhai, deadly duo! Kya strategy banti hai unki, next level! Ab dekhna kaun rokta unhe.

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Haan, aur waha batting mein Pollard aur bowling mein Malinga, wah bhai! Kya mast mix hai!

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: [laughs] Exactly! MI ka toh bas ek hi formula—har season dhamaka! High-five for true blue MI fans!
